items.sentence: You\'re the only one here who doesn\'t know Tom.
I\'ll see you there on the twentieth of October.
You\'re the one spending the most time with Tom.
You\'re the only one who can solve this problem.
She implied that she would like to come with us.
I can\'t afford to buy a car, much less a house.
Tom lives in an apartment not far from my place.
Has Tom been saying bad things about Mary again?
Tom didn\'t mention why he was looking for Mary.
Tom says he doesn\'t know what Mary wants to do.
